mapper.select: SELECT t.id id, t.start_date startDate, t.rate_half_year rateHalfYear, t.rate_one_year rateOneYear, t.rate_three_year rateThreeYear, t.rate_five_year rateFiveYear, t.rate_over_five_year rateOverFiveYear, t.create_time createTime, t.update_time updateTime, t.creator creator, t.updater updater, t.deleted deleted, t.tenant_id tenantId FROM biz_calc_interest_rate_data t ORDER BY t.start_date

SELECT t.id id, t.start_date startDate, t.rate_half_year rateHalfYear, t.rate_one_year rateOneYear, t.rate_three_year rateThreeYear, t.rate_five_year rateFiveYear, t.rate_over_five_year rateOverFiveYear, t.create_time createTime, t.update_time updateTime, t.creator creator, t.updater updater, t.deleted deleted, t.tenant_id tenantId FROM biz_calc_interest_rate_data t WHERE t.start_date <= #{date} ORDER BY t.start_date desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_calc_exec_data ( id, process_id, rate_id, date_index, day_rate, day_amount ) VALUES ( #{id},#{processId},#{rateId},#{dateIndex},#{dayRate},#{dayAmount} )
